ing: 1 French baguette, cut into 1/2 inch slices
des: "Tastes rich and crunchy, yet it's very quick and simple to prepare. Lovely with a nice glass of wine.  Sometimes I make this for myself to eat with a salad."
ins: Pour chopped nuts into a bowl, and set aside.  Spread each bread slice with approximately 1 tablespoon goat cheese. Dip into the pecans to thoroughly coat the cheese.  Arrange on a plate, and push a grape half into the top of  the cheese on each slice.
